categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Erisher was an individual who served the Galactic Empire as a commander aboard the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Inflictor following the Battle of Endor. Erisher was present when Grand Moff Randd promoted Ciena Ree to Captain of the Inflictor.
Erisher was first mentioned in the canon novel Lost Stars, which was written by Claudia Gray and published in 2015.
